TopicTitle: How to download the Ksp launcher?

Articles.Content:
Help,

were can i download the ksp launcher?

btw im playing on steam.
Ksp launcher is included in steam release, just go to where ksp installed and press launcher.exe, but it's quite useless and better use ksp_x64.exe.

Yeah, just get the zip file. The launcher has always been troubled. Meanwhile, your thread has been moved to the Gameplay sub. 

And welcome to the forum.
